column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I had never had real ramen in my life until I came to Houston. I tried a few other joints before hand which were pretty good. But one day I tried this place and WOW. I was hooked. I have tried most of their ramen variations on the menu
column2: but nothing beats Tonkatsu Black. The broth is so good and everything mixes in well. The only minor complaint is that I wish there was a little more meat. The chicken appetizer is pretty good too! Desserts are meh
column3: but that's not what you come here for. Best ramen I've ever had in my life!
